value.name: Vancouver Aquarium president and CEO John Nightingale will retire at end of the year
value.description: Today, Vancouver Aquarium president and CEO John Nightingale emailed the following statement to supporters of his organization: After 25 years as the President and CEO of the Vancouver Aquarium ...

value.name: UK soldier dies in Iraq `accident`
value.description: Sergeant John Nightingale, 32, from Leeds ... of his death were being investigated by the Royal Military Police, but Sgt Nightingale did not die as a result of enemy action.
